original_text: In past times, when the leaders of Israel spoke, the people were afraid. Corinthians 15:55. Because of Jesus' death, Paul says that the power of death can no longer hurt believers. I will not be kind to my people and forgive them.’ Corinthians 15:55. Because of Jesus' death, Paul says that the power of death can no longer hurt believers. I will not be kind to my people and forgive them.’ Corinthians 15:55. Because of Jesus' death, Paul says that the power of death can no longer hurt believers. I will not be kind to my people and forgive them.’ Corinthians 15:55. Because of Jesus' death, Paul says that the power of death can no longer hurt believers. I will not be kind to my people and forgive them.’
korean_text: 에브라임이 말을 하면 사람들이 떨었도다 그가 이스라엘 중에서 자기를 높이더니 바알로 말미암아 범죄하므로 망하였거늘

sentences.original_text: when the leaders of Israel spoke,
the power of death can no longer hurt believers.
sentences.korean_translation: 사망의 권능이 더 이상 믿는 자들을 해할 수 없습니다.

sentences.original_text: I will not be kind to my people
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 내 백성에게 친절하지 않을 것이며
